La Galeria Gitana.knownFor: “ Beauty in the Heart of San Fernando ” Reviewed July 15, 2015 La Galeria Gitana is situated in a small shopping center within walking distance of the courthouse, City Hall, and the SFPD. It's a small gallery that has rotating, juried art shows every couple of months. It's steps from Compania de Cafe.
